"Well, now to the health of handsome wom- en!" said D61okhov, and with a serious expres- sion, but with a smile lurking at the corners of his mouth, he turned with his glass to Pierre. 
"Here's to the health of lovely women, Pe- tcrkin and their lovers!" he added.
